============================================================--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managertpservice_4" xmlns="http://ap.com/wsdl/managertpservice_4" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:mrd="http://ap.com/xsd/managertpdata_4" xmlns:flt="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4"> <wsdl:documentation>This WSDL is used to communicate between Distributor and AP, When Distributor submits a RTP request to AP.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managertpservice_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managertpdata_4" schemaLocation="managertpdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/soapfault_4.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="APFaultDetails"> <wsdl:part name="APFaultDetails" element="flt:APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitRTP_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="submitrtp_1request" element="mrd:SubmitRTP_1Request"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitRTP_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="submitRTP_1Response" element="mrd:SubmitRTP_1Response"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManageRTP_4PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="submitRTP_1"> <wsdl:documentation>Submit RTP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="submitRTP_1Request" message="submitRTP_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="submitRTP_1Response" message="submitRTP_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ManageRTPSOAPBinding_4" type="ManageRTP_4PortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submitRTP_1"> <soap:operation soapAction="submitRTP_1" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails"> <soap:fault name="APFaultDetails" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ManageRTPService_4"> <wsdl:port name="ManageRTPSOAPEndpoint_4" binding="ManageRTPSOAPBinding_4"> <soap:address location="http://www.ap.com/services/ManageRTP_4"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" xmlns:pmd="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" xmlns:ack="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/messageheaderdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/requestorigination_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/requestoriginationdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/rtpdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/riskassessment_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/paymentdetailsdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/acknowledgementdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitRTPType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="SubmitRTPMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element ref="ori:DeviceInformation"/> <xsd:element ref="ori:CookieDetls" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ori:BrowserInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:RTPSenderInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:RTPSummaryDetails"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:RTPDetail" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Delivery"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantLinkDetails" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitRTPMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="SubmitRTPMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SubmitRTPMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseRTPType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element ref="ResponseInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="rsk:DistRiskAsmtDetails"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ResponseInfo" type="cmn:ResponseInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element defines the BRN Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Sender Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotifyRecipientInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RTPIdtrType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotifyRTPStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="pmd:TxnStatus"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:TxnStatusDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderClosureReason" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:FundsCheckOK" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SubmitRTP_1Request" type="SubmitRTPType"/> <xsd:element name="SubmitRTP_1Response" type="ResponseRTPType"/> <xsd:element name="Delivery" type="DeliveryInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Delivery Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DeliveryInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DeliveryType"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryAddressInfo" type="DeliveryAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="cmn:EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryDate" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeliveryAddressInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AddresseeName" type="cmn:AddresseeNameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryAddress" type="cmn:DeliveryAddressType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureReasonCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Closure Reason code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="000"/> <xsd:enumeration value="001"/> <xsd:enumeration value="002"/> <xsd:enumeration value="003"/> <xsd:enumeration value="004"/> <xsd:enumeration value="005"/> <xsd:enumeration value="006"/> <xsd:enumeration value="007"/> <xsd:enumeration value="100"/> <xsd:enumeration value="103"/> <xsd:enumeration value="104"/> <xsd:enumeration value="105"/> <xsd:enumeration value="106"/> <xsd:enumeration value="107"/> <xsd:enumeration value="208"/> <xsd:enumeration value="209"/> <xsd:enumeration value="211"/> <xsd:enumeration value="212"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="RequestInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="cmn:CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="RequestAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnquireSettlementStatusRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="EnquireSettlementStatusRequestMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element name="SenderInfo" type="SenderInfoType"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SetlmtRtvlId" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnquireSettlementStatusRequestMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="EnquireSettlementStatusRequestMsgTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="REQSETTLEMENTSTATUS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="EnquireSettlementStatusResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="EnquireSettlementStatusResponseMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtConfirmationDetails"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderClosureReason" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OcrDesc" name="AdtnlOrderInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidResponseInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidMarketingInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:TxChannel" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxCheckout"/> <xsd:element name="PaidByCredit" type="cmn:YNType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PayConnectInfo" type="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component provides the PayConnect Info Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:CookieId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:CookieExpiryDays" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkDetails" type="MerchantLinkDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantLinkDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingFlag" type="cmn:YType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalLinkingInfo" type="AdditionalLinkingInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalLinkingInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Type" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:simpleType name="TypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MIT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AOF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BOTH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType>--> <xsd:complexType name="RTPLinkedDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Token" type="cmn:Max19Text"/> <xsd:element name="AuthorisationRequiredFlag" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh Babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKADDCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKDELCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ADDMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSHNOTIFY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INBROWSERPAYMTINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYDEFERREDSETTLEMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYDEFERREDRTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMENTSTATUSRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTPAYMENTSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTRTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOTRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOSTLMT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVETRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPGETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOCONSADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOCICODES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPTOPAYMENTCONFIRMATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORBRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORGEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFOREPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOGETREFACCFRMCFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTTOSETTLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOSRTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEFERREDSETTLEMENTSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEFERREDRTPSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACRRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOACR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SETTLEMENTSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITMEDIAPAYMENTREQUEST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITMEDIAPAYMENTRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITLINKEDRTPRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYLINKEDRTPINIT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : commondata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QkPayDeliveryAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PostCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddresseeNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Title" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FirstName" type="Max107Text"/> <xsd:element name="MiddleName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="OrderRef" type="Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Reference</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SettlementType" type="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates settlement type of the successful payment transaction e.g. FPS/ONUS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of successful payment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ONUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-SIP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-FDP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Title" type="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MRS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MISS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SIR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAME"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROF"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="BRN" type="BRNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Basket Reference Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="BRNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Basket Reference Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[a-zA-Z]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ApTransactionId" type="ApTransactionIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTransactionIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact37Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ApTRId" type="ApTRIdNewType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTRIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact18NumericText"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTRIdNewType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact18NumericText"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RequestType" type="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RTPId" type="RTPIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique transaction reference code generated by the Message sender-Distributor to uniquely identify their transaction, .i.e , Incase of MsgType is SUBMITRTOFORBILLPAY, it would be the Bill ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RTPIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="Max60Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ReconId" type="ReconIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reconciliation Id assigned by AP Server to the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ReconIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Recon Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="RECON((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))((0[1-9])|(1[012]))[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of retrieve message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of confirm message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15TextOptional"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^/\.@ ][^@/ ]*[@][^/@\. ]+[\.][^@/ ]*[^@/\. ]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DeliveryType" type="DeliveryTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DeliveryTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="COLLST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELTAD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DIGDEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SERVICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="F2F"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NONE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="34"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Currency</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency Code as per ISO 4217 standard</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxChannel" type="TxChannelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TxChannelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="M-Com"/> <xsd:enumeration value="E-Com"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="RetrieveInitMethodEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Method that was used by the consumer to retrieve the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="INTENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSH-NOTIFICATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QRCODE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BARCODE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NFC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MEDIASCAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ATMSCAN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmt" type="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component comprises the risk score and has child elements</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Total"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Total" type="TotalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The current Featurespace implementation will send this field instead of the actual Risk Assessment data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TotalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="BRN" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="ApTRId"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtRtvlId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="ReconId"/> <xsd:element name="CookieStatus" type="YNType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FIShortName" type="FIShortNameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> <xsd:element ref="OrderValue" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PEDCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CICode" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Delivery" type="DeliveryInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Delivery Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DeliveryInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DeliveryType"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryAddressInfo" type="DeliveryAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryDate" type="ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeliveryAddressInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AddresseeName" type="AddresseeNameType"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryAddress" type="DeliveryAddressType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SuspensionInfo" type="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Details of Suspension</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspension" type="ConsumerSuspensionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspension" type="MerchantSuspensionType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerSuspensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspensionInitiator" type="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspensionCode" type="SuspensionCodeEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantSuspensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspensionInitiator" type="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspensionCode" type="SuspensionCodeEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ZAPP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DIST"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SuspensionCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="FRAUDC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FRAUDS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USEREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VULPER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IDTHEF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VIOLAG"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VIOLZA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EXCRGB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INSOLV"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COLLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ILLEGA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LAUNDE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ACRType" type="ACRTypeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="ACRTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Authorisation Check Request Type – This is to check the following: 0 – Neither check avalability of fund nor secure the Deferred Txn Amount; 1 - Check avalability of funds; 2 - Secure the Deferred Txn Amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="RTPIdentifier"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="ApTRId"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtRtvlId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ReconId"/> <xsd:element ref="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PaymentRef" type="Max42TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Payment Ref Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code of the Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="PostCodeOptionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeliveryAddressType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="PostCodeOptionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ISODate"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"> <xsd:pattern value="((000[1-9])|(00[1-9][0-9])|(0[1-9][0-9]{2})|([1-9][0-9]{3}))-((0[1-9])|(1[012]))-((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ISODateTime"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:pattern value="((000[1-9])|(00[1-9][0-9])|(0[1-9][0-9]{2})|([1-9][0-9]{3}))-((0[1-9])|(1[012]))-((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))T(([01][0-9])|(2[0-3]))(:[0-5][0-9]){2}(\.[0-9]{1,3})?Z"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max35Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max20Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max73Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="73"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max35TextOptional"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max45Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="45"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max55Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="55"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max55TextOptional"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="55"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max60TextOptional"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:enumeration value="HIGH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureReason" type="OrderClosureReasonCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureReasonCodeEnum"> <xsd:element name="OcrDesc" type="Max255Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order closure reason Description where the order has been closed</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FundsCheckOK" type="YNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Not present if funds check not requested, True when funds check requested and passed, False when funds check <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max60Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ConsumerTrackingReference" type="ConsumerTrackingReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Zapp generated reference to identify the consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ConsumerTrackingReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Zapp generated reference to identify the consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CheckFundsACRTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Authorisation Check Request Type – This is to check the following: 0 – Neither check avalability of fund nor secure the Deferred Txn Amount; 1 - Check avalability of funds; 2 - Secure the Deferred Txn Amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="GiftAidResponseInd" type="GiftAidResponseIndType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GiftAidResponseIndType"> <xsd:annotation> value="NA"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="GiftAidMarketingInd" type="GiftAidMarketingIndType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GiftAidMarketingIndType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Gift aid market indicator</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="YES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NONR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Max 19 Type--> <xsd:simpleType name="Max19Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="19"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FIShortNameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Max8 Type--> <xsd:simpleType name="Max8Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> type="ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutDecisionTimeStamp" type="ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutResponseState" type="PayOutResponseStateEnum"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutCancelledReasonCode" type="PayOutCancelledReasonCodeEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--PayOutResponseStateEnum Definition--> <xsd:simpleType name="PayOutResponseStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Values allowed for PayOutResponse state</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCELLED"/> <xsd:enumeration <xsd:documentation>Values allowed for PayOutCancelledReasonCode state</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="P01"/> <xsd:enumeration <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingFlag" type="YType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

Merchant Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="cmn:RetrieveInitMethodEnum"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceDetls" type="DeviceDetlsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RequestOrigination" type="RequestOriginationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Request Origination Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceDetls" type="DeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceInformation" type="DeviceInformationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which distributor is operating)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BrowserInfo" type="BrowserInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination BrowserInfo from which the details is originating (browser from which the consumer is shopping). Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFOREPOS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CookieDetls" type="CookieDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping). Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFOREPOS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="CookieDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CookieId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeviceInformationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which distributor is operating)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DistDeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> <xsd:element ref="TermLocID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveCICodeDeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating for message RetrieveCICode (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BrowserInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of standard browser type elements</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UserAgent" type="cmn:Max256Text"/> <xsd:element name="ActiveHeaders" type="cmn:Max256Text"/> <xsd:element name="TimeZone" type="cmn:Max32Text"/> <xsd:element name="Screen" type="cmn:Max64Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CookieId" type="cmn:Max36Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the IP Address of the transaction originating source</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TermLocID" type="cmn:Max128Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the Terminal Location Id. Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFORMOB, SUBMITRTPFORBRN, SUBMITRTPFORGEN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceOS" type="DeviceOSEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the OS of the device from which the transaction is originating</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DeviceOSEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the OS of the device from which the transaction is originating</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WINMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHERS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="IPAddress" type="IPAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the IP Address of the transaction originating source</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="IPAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IPAddress</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="45"/> <xsd:pattern value="(((25[0-5])|(2[0-4]\d)|(1?\d{1,2}))\.){3}((25[0-5])|(2[0-4]\d)|(1?\d{1,2}))"/> <xsd:pattern value="([0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)::(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){6,6})(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)){3}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)::(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:)*)(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)){3}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <!--Normal IPv6--> <!--IPv6 Hex Compressed--> <!--IPv6 Hex + IPv4 Dec--> <!--IPv6 Hex Compressed + IPv4 Dec--> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : rtpsummarydata_4.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh Babu--> <!--MIG Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--Change history : Added dontations to the txn type as a part of http://10.105.34.62:8080/browse/AP-4161--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="RTPSummaryDetails" type="RTPSummaryDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includesthe summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSummaryDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includes the summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProductType"/> <xsd:element ref="TxType"/> <xsd:element ref="TxCheckout"/> <xsd:element ref="TxIdentification"/> <xsd:element ref="TxRestriction" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="InvoiceDateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymtInfo"/> <xsd:element name="CanUseCredit" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProductType" type="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONLINE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONLINEMPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SMB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TELEPHONE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxType" type="TxTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxCheckout" type="TxCheckoutEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction CheckOut</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxIdentification" type="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Transaction Identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxRestriction" type="TxRestrictionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the restrictions for the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TxRestrictionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction Restriction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="16PLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="18PLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="25PLUS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="InvoiceDateTime" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="cmn:CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="PaymtInfo" type="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the PaymtInfo</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies the type of settlement request (immediate or deferred).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PaymtAmtInfo" type="PaymtAmtInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillData" type="BillDataType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPInfo" type="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ACRType"/> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPExpDateTime" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date until which the agreement is valid.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total indicative Amount (Guideline Price) of subsequent payment Transaction or the Bill Amount which has to be agreed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount up-to which customer agreed to pay via subsequent payment /Billing Transaction(s).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="DetailedAmtType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Detailed amount description associated with the total amount of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPIdentifier" type="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP order payment identifier.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PaymtAmtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="DetailedAmt" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TxTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transactions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="BILLPT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INVOICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DONATIONS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PEDCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:CICode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="RetrieveInitMethod" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TxDtTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CodeRequired" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SettlementTxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="TxDtTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CodeRequired" type="CodeRequiredTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element will indicate what must be sent in response to the submit request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeRequiredTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="BRN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxDtTime" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> <xsd:simpleType name="TxCheckoutEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="GAIDCHK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NRMLCHK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QKPACHK"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="DetailedAmtType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DetailedAmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AmtType" type="AmtCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="AmtValue" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="Rate" type="cmn:decimalType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Applied Rate</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="AmtCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Detailed Amount Description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DELC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FEES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RBTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VATX"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> name="BillPeriodFrom" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillPeriodTo" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillAdhocInfo" type="cmn:Max55TextOptional" component comprises of all the information on the requested settlement amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtReqDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> type="SettlementTxIdentificationType"/> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureRequestType" type="OrderClosureRequestTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtInfo" type="SetlmtInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="cmn:CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProductCode"/> <xsd:element ref="ProductDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitOfMeasure" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ProductQuantity" <xsd:element name="ProductCode" type="cmn:Max70Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Product Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProductDesc" type="cmn:Max70TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Product Description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UnitOfMeasure" type="UnitOfMeasureCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Unit of Measure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UnitOfMeasureCode"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACRE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ARES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CELI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CMET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQYA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TONS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USGA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USOU"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USPI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USQA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YARD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureRequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RTPSenderInfo" type="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The full information of the RTP Sender ,i.e the Distributor and teh End Merchant information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="DetailMerchantInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtSenderInfo" information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DetailMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantInfo" type="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Merchant details along with the address of the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:MerchantRtnStrng" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ACRType" type="cmn:ACRTypeEnum"/> <xsd:complexType name="AdtnlRTPInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidResponseInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidMarketingInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtPymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="cmn:RetrieveInitMethodEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the POS method that was used by the consumer to retrieve the transaction. E.g. QR Code, Bar Code, NFC etc Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFORMOB, SUBMITRTPFORBRN, SUBMITRTPFORGEN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddtnlOrderInfo" type="AddtnlOrderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds additional information regarding the order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddtnlOrderInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureRequestType" type="cmn:OrderClosureRequestTypeCode"/> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount up-to which customer agreed to pay via subsequent payment /Billing Transaction(s).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total indicative Amount (Guideline Price) of subsequent payment Transaction or the Bill Amount which has to be agreed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GHSFailureReason" type="GHSFailureReasonEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GHSFailureReasonEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSEFAILURE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="GHSRTPInfoType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="RTPInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="GHSFailureReason" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="cmn:NumberType"/> <xsd:element name="FunctionCode" type="FunctionCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="FunctionCodeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="12"/> <xsd:enumeration value="22"/> <xsd:enumeration value="23"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Z1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="02"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="BillReference" type="cmn:Max28Text"/> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="RTPIdentifier" type="cmn:RTPIdentifier"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP Idenitifier</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RawQRCode"
