<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distributordata.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="DistributorId" type="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This holds Distributor Id.In case of Bill Pay,this will hold the id applicable for ‘MyBillsOnline’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Distributor Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DistributorName" type="cmn:Max35TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantGroupId" type="cmn:Max60TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned as Merchant Group id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLogoURL" type="cmn:Max512Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Merchant Logo URL</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MerchantCmnNameOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:Max35TextOptional"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Address with Post Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="cmn:CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistributorInfo" type="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="DistributorName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantCmnName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantCtgyCd" type="cmn:Max4Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Merchant Ctgy Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KeyMerchantId" type="cmn:Max6Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingDetails" type="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantTokenDetails"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantTokenDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant token details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Token" type="cmn:Max19Text"/> <xsd:element name="TokenExpiry" type="cmn:Exact4NumericText"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantTokenDetails" type="MerchantTokenDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : FIdata.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAccountInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="FIShortName"/> <xsd:element ref="FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FIId" type="FIIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The FIId of the FI with which the Consumer is registered for AP service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FIShortName" type="cmn:Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message field specifies the FI Short Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerId" type="cmn:Max28Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the unique customer Id provided by the FI to AP.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConsumerAcct" type="ConsumerAcctType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account related information including the fund /balance position</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AcctNum" type="cmn:AccountNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AcctSortCode" type="cmn:SortCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account sort code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RollNum" type="cmn:RollNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the Roll number information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAcctType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="AcctNum"/> <xsd:element ref="AcctSortCode"/> <xsd:element ref="RollNum" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="FIIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FI Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerDetails" type="FIConsumerDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the FIConsumerDetails</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccountNickName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message field specifies the token</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIShortName"/> <xsd:element ref="AccountNickName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account related information including the fund /balance position</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmt" type="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistRiskAsmtDetails" type="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ConsumerRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConsumerRiskAssessment" type="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIConsumerId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantRiskAssessment" type="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="IssueCodes" type="cmn:Max1024Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Issue codes provide insight to why a consumer or merchant has an elevated risk score.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AssessmentType" type="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="standard"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="StatusCode" type="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Score" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive, with 0 being the lowest risk and 1 being the highest risk.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Confidence" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive with 0 being the lowest confidence and 1 being the highest confidence.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmtResp" type="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If any information is unavailable in the ‘consumerAssessments’ or ‘merchantAssessments’ in the response from Fraud, then only this field with value ‘NOTAVL’ will be sent without the ‘consumerAssessments’ and the ‘merchantAssessments’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTAVL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:rtp="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : paymentdetailsdata_4.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : Draft--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" schemaLocation="rtpdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentConfirmationDetails" type="PaymentConfirmationDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides details of the payment made.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentConfirmationDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"/> <xsd:element name="PymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RTPStatusInfo" type="RTPStatusInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information on the status of the RTP Confirmation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPStatusInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxnStatus" type="PaymentTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="TxnStatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:FundsCheckOK" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PaidByCredit" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ACRStatusInfo" type="ACRStatusInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ACRStatusInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxnStatus" type="PaymentTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="TxnStatusCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtPaymtDetails" type="SetlmtPaymtDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information on the Settlement Payment details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtPaymtDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SetlmtRtvlId"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtStatus" type="PaymentTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtStatusCode"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AddtnlRTPInfo" type="AddtnlRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Information on Additional RTP information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddtnlRTPInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidResponseInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidMarketingInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="QkPayDelAddressInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtPymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MediaBillReference" type="cmn:Max28Text" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:QkPayDelAddressInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="NotifyPaymentDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"/> <xsd:element name="PymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ConsumerTrackingReference"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotifyPaymentStatusType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxnStatus" type="NotifyPaymentTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element name="TxnStatusDesc" type="NotifyPaymentTxnStatusDescEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"/> <xsd:element name="PymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentDetailsTypeForEnquireRTP"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="cmn:RetrieveInitMethodEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentStatusInfo" type="PaymentStatusTypeForEnquiryRTP"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelEmail" type="cmn:EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:EmailVerificationCodeStatus" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:InitiatorIsAuthoriser" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CookieId" type="cmn:Max36Text" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CookieExpiryDays" type="cmn:NumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentStatusTypeForEnquiryRTP"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxnStatus" type="EnquireRTPTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="TxnStatusDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="TxnStatus" type="TxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="TxnStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INCOMPLETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INPROGRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYENQFAILED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AWAITINGSETTLEMENT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxnStatusCode" type="TxnStatusCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="TxnStatusCodeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="A00"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A01"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A02"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A03"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A04"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A05"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A06"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A07"/> <xsd:enumeration value="A08"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxnStatusDesc" type="TxnStatusDescEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="TxnStatusDescEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LATEAUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LATEDECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROCESSINGERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TRANSACTIONERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtConfirmationDetails" type="SetlmtConfirmationDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides details of the payment made.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtConfirmationDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SetlmtRtvlId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtStatus"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtStatusDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtPymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtStatus" type="SetlmtStatusEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="SetlmtStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INCOMPLETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INPROGRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYENQFAILED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEVERAUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LATEAUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEVERCONFIRMED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtStatusCode" type="SetlmtStatusCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="SetlmtStatusCodeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="S00"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S01"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S02"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S03"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S04"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S05"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S06"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S07"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S08"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtStatusDesc" type="SetlmtStatusDescEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="SetlmtStatusDescEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LATEAUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LATEDECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROCESSINGERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TRANSACTIONERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="PaymentTxnStatus" type="PaymentTxnStatusEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="PaymentTxnStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NotifyPaymentTxnStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INCOMPLETE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NotifyPaymentTxnStatusDescEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROCESSINGERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TRANSACTIONERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EnquireRTPTxnStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHORISED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DECLINED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INCOMPLETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INPROGRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYENQFAILED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="PayConnectInfo" type="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SetPCCookie Flag must capture Consumer's decision to set PayConnect cookie and/or the cookie re-linkage decision within the FI Mobile App</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PCCFlag" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingInfo" type="MerchantLinkingInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantLinkingInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingFlag" type="cmn:YNType"/> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerAccountDetails" type="FIConsumerAccountDetailsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MaxAutoAuthLimit" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerAccountDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains fi consumer details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerIBAN" type="cmn:Exact34Text"/> <xsd:element name="AccountNickName" type="cmn:Max35Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managelinkedrtpservice_1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managelinkedrtpdata_1" schemaLocation="managelinkedrtpdata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/soapfault_4.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="APFaultDetails"> <wsdl:part name="APFaultDetails" element="flt:APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitLinkedRTP_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="submitLinkedRTP_1Request" element="mrd:SubmitLinkedRTP_1Request"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitLinkedRTP_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="submitLinkedRTP_1Response" element="mrd:SubmitLinkedRTP_1Response"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManageLinkedRTP_1PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="submitLinkedRTP_1"> <wsdl:documentation>Submit Linked RTP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="submitLinkedRTP_1Request" message="submitLinkedRTP_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="submitLinkedRTP_1Response" message="submitLinkedRTP_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ManageLinkedRTPSOAPBinding_1" type="ManageLinkedRTP_1PortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submitLinkedRTP_1"> <soap:operation soapAction="submitLinkedRTP_1" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails"> <soap:fault name="APFaultDetails" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ManageLinkedRTPService_1"> <wsdl:port name="ManageLinkedRTPSOAPEndpoint_1" binding="ManageLinkedRTPSOAPBinding_1"> <soap:address location="http://www.ap.com/services/ManageLinkedRTP_1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="LinkedRTPResponseInfo" type="LinkedRTPResponseInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element defines the BRN Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="LinkedRTPResponseInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SetlmtRtvlId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ReconId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitLinkedRTPMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="SubmitLinkedRTPMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SubmitLinkedRTPMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITLINKEDRTP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="LinkedRTPSummary" type="LinkedRTPSummaryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element contains transaction summary</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="LinkedRTPSummaryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includes the summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="LinkedRTPDetails"/> <xsd:element ref="ProductType"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxType"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxCheckout"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalLinkingInfo" type="AdditionalLinkingInfoType"/> <xsd:element ref="TxIdentification"/> <xsd:element ref="LinkedPaymtInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalLinkingInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Type" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:simpleType name="TypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MIT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AOF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BOTH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType>--> <xsd:element name="ProductType" type="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="LinkedPaymtInfo" type="LinkedPaymtInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="LinkedRTPDetails" type="LinkedRTPDetailsType"/> <xsd:complexType name="LinkedPaymtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies the type of settlement request (immediate or deferred).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PaymtAmtInfo" type="rtp:PaymtAmtInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillData" type="rtp:BillDataType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPInfo" type="DefrdRTPInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinkedRTPDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Token" type="cmn:Max19Text"/> <xsd:element name="AuthorisationRequiredFlag" type="cmn:YType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ONLINE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SMB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TELEPHONE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxIdentification" type="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Transaction Identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxDtTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderRef" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="rtp:ACRType"/> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPExpDateTime" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date until which the agreement is valid.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total indicative Amount (Guideline Price) of subsequent payment Transaction or the Bill Amount which has to be agreed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount up-to which customer agreed to pay via subsequent payment /Billing Transaction(s).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="rtp:DetailedAmtType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Detailed amount description associated with the total amount of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPIdentifier" type="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP order payment identifier.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QkPayDeliveryAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PostCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddresseeNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Title" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FirstName" type="Max107Text"/> <xsd:element name="MiddleName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="OrderRef" type="Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Reference</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SettlementType" type="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates settlement type of the successful payment transaction e.g. FPS/ONUS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of successful payment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ONUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-SIP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-FDP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Title" type="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MRS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MISS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SIR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAME"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROF"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="BRN" type="BRNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Basket Reference Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="BRNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Basket Reference Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[a-zA-Z]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ApTransactionId" type="ApTransactionIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTransactionIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact37Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ApTRId" type="ApTRIdNewType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTRIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact18NumericText"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ApTRIdNewType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The AP Transaction Retrieval Id generated by AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact18NumericText"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RequestType" type="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RTPId" type="RTPIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique transaction reference code generated by the Message sender-Distributor to uniquely identify their transaction, .i.e , Incase of MsgType is SUBMITRTOFORBILLPAY, it would be the Bill ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RTPIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="Max60Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ReconId" type="ReconIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reconciliation Id assigned by AP Server to the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ReconIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Recon Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="RECON((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))((0[1-9])|(1[012]))[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of retrieve message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of confirm message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15TextOptional"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^/\.@ ][^@/ ]*[@][^/@\. ]+[\.][^@/ ]*[^@/\. ]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DeliveryType" type="DeliveryTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DeliveryTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="COLLST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELTAD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DIGDEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SERVICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="F2F"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NONE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="34"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Currency</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency Code as per ISO 4217 standard</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxChannel" type="TxChannelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TxChannelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="M-Com"/> <xsd:enumeration value="E-Com"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="RetrieveInitMethodEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Method that was used by the consumer to retrieve the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="INTENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSH-NOTIFICATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QRCODE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BARCODE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NFC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MEDIASCAN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ATMSCAN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmt" type="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component comprises the risk score and has child name="Total" type="TotalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The current Featurespace implementation will send this field instead of the actual Risk Assessment data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TotalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/>
