<xsd:documentation>Merchant Category Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmailId" type="EmailAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="MobNb" type="MobileNumberType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="MobileNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Mobile Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9,\-\(\)\.\+]{1,35}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag type for Y or N</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="YType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag type for Y only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TargetURI" type="Max255Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the target URI</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ServiceVersion" type="Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Service Version</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max445Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="445"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max512Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="512"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NormalizedMax512Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:normalizedString"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="512"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max28Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="28"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max23Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="23"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="AddressLine1" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressLine2" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address2</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressLine3" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address3</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressLine4" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address4</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressLine5" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address5</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddressLine6" type="Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address6</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RollNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Roll Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max1024Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="1024"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max36Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="36"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max128Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="128"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="EmailVerificationCodeStatus" type="EmailVerificationCodeStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates Email Verification Code Status type e.g. VERFIFIED/NOT VERIFIED</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailVerificationCodeStatusEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="Verified"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Not Verified"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAddressesType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Consumer Addresss which are stored by Zapp</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsumerAddress" type="ConsumerAddressType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Consumer Addresss which are stored by Zapp</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressId"/> <xsd:element ref="ThirdPartyAddresseeFlag"/> <xsd:element ref="DateAddressAdded"/> <xsd:element name="AddresseeName" type="AddresseeNameType"/> <xsd:element name="Address" type="AddressMandatoryCountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QkPayMobNoInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component comprises of the Consumer’s mobile number held by the CFI and the Verfication status of the mobile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MobNb"/> <xsd:element ref="MobNbVerified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AddressId" type="Max36Text"/> <xsd:element name="DateAddressAdded" type="ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element name="CFIRegistered" type="YNType"/> <xsd:element name="ThirdPartyAddresseeFlag" type="YNType"/> <xsd:element name="DeliveryAddressId" type="Max36Text"/> <xsd:element name="AddresseeName" type="AddresseeNameType"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddress" type="QkPayDeliveryAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="InitiatorIsAuthoriser" type="YNType"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayMobNoInfo" type="QkPayMobNoInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="MobNbVerified" type="YNType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QkPayDelAddressInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CFIRegistered" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="DeliveryAddressId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ThirdPartyAddresseeFlag" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddresseeName"/> <xsd:element ref="QkPayDelAddress" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="QkPayMobNoInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressStatus" type="QkPayDelAddressStatusEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ThirdPartyAddresseeFlag" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddresseeName"/> <xsd:element ref="QkPayDelAddress" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="QkPayMobNoInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelEmail" type="EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="EmailVerificationCodeStatus"/> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="Max75TextOptional" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="UpdateReason" type="UpdateReasonEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the List of Update Reason codes for the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateReasonEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTBLCK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISPUTE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OPRATNL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHERRS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RLTCLSD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ZAPSRCL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="QkPayDelAddressStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of QkPayDelAddressStatus</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CFIREGISTERED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="StatusCode" type="StatusCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The status code with values success and failure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="StatusCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="AccountErrorReason" type="AccountErrorReasonEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Account Error Reason Valid values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountErrorReasonEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Account Error Reason Valid values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACCTSUSP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACCTCLSD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACCTNTVLD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACCTRETFAILURE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHER"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtRtvlId" type="SetlmtRtvlIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Settlement Retrieval ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="SetlmtRtvlIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Settlement Retrieval ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Exact18Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtRef" type="SetlmtRefType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Settlement Reference Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtRefType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Settlement Reference Info Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtRtvlId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RTPType" type="RTPTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is used to specify the type of settlement request (immediate or deferred).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RTPTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="IMMEDIATE"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates Immediate Payment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="DEFERRED"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates Deferred Payment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Exact6NumericText"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Exact4NumericText"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="4"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{4}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="CookieId" type="Max36Text"/> <xsd:element name="CookieExpiryDays" type="NumberType"/> <xsd:element name="PayConnectInfo" type="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component provides the PayConnect Info Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="RetrieveInitMethodEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="InitiatorIsAuthoriser" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CookieId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CookieExpiryDays" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CICode" type="Max23Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CI Code scanned from QR Code/Bar Code on mobile banking app.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PEDCode" type="Exact6NumericText"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CI Code typed by Consumer/Merchant manually.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OrderValue" type="OrderValueFlag"/> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderValueFlag"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag identifies whether total payment request amount or deferred RTP max agreed amount is more than the pre-configured value set by Zapp.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="LOW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HIGH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureReason" type="OrderClosureReasonCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureReasonCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Closure Reason code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="000"/> <xsd:enumeration value="001"/> <xsd:enumeration value="002"/> <xsd:enumeration value="003"/> <xsd:enumeration value="004"/> <xsd:enumeration value="005"/> <xsd:enumeration value="006"/> <xsd:enumeration value="007"/> <xsd:enumeration value="008"/> <xsd:enumeration value="100"/> <xsd:enumeration value="103"/> <xsd:enumeration value="104"/> <xsd:enumeration value="105"/> <xsd:enumeration value="106"/> <xsd:enumeration value="107"/> <xsd:enumeration value="208"/> <xsd:enumeration value="209"/> <xsd:enumeration value="211"/> <xsd:enumeration value="212"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OcrDesc" type="Max255Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order closure reason Description where the order has been closed</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FundsCheckOK" type="YNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Not present if funds check not requested, True when funds check requested and passed, False when funds check requested and failed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureRequestTypeCode"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max60Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ConsumerTrackingReference" type="ConsumerTrackingReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Zapp generated reference to identify the consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ConsumerTrackingReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Zapp generated reference to identify the consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CheckFundsACRTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Authorisation Check Request Type – This is to check the following: 0 – Neither check avalability of fund nor secure the Deferred Txn Amount; 1 - Check avalability of funds; 2 - Secure the Deferred Txn Amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="GiftAidResponseInd" type="GiftAidResponseIndType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GiftAidResponseIndType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Gift aid address indicator</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="YES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NA"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="GiftAidMarketingInd" type="GiftAidMarketingIndType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GiftAidMarketingIndType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Gift aid market indicator</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="YES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NONR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Max 19 Type--> <xsd:simpleType name="Max19Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="19"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FIShortNameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Max8 Type--> <xsd:simpleType name="Max8Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DirectConsumerAccountFlag" type="YNType"/> <xsd:element name="DirectConsumerRefundFlag" type="YNType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PayOutSettlementDetails"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PayOut Settlement details for ZAPP to update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PayOutTRId" type="ApTRIdType"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutAmount" type="ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutDecisionTimeStamp" type="ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutResponseState" type="PayOutResponseStateEnum"/> <xsd:element name="PayOutCancelledReasonCode" type="PayOutCancelledReasonCodeEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--PayOutResponseStateEnum Definition--> <xsd:simpleType name="PayOutResponseStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Values allowed for PayOutResponse state</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCELLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--PayOutCancelledReasonCodeEnum Definition--> <xsd:simpleType name="PayOutCancelledReasonCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Values allowed for PayOutCancelledReasonCode state</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="P01"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P02"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P03"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P04"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P05"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingDetails" type="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingFlag" type="YType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/requestorigination_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/requestorigination_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : requestorigination_4.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="RequestOriginationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the End Merchant Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="cmn:RetrieveInitMethodEnum"/> <xsd:element name="DeviceDetls" type="DeviceDetlsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RequestOrigination" type="RequestOriginationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Request Origination Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceDetls" type="DeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceInformation" type="DeviceInformationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which distributor is operating)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BrowserInfo" type="BrowserInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination BrowserInfo from which the details is originating (browser from which the consumer is shopping). Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFOREPOS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CookieDetls" type="CookieDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping). Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFOREPOS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="CookieDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CookieId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeviceInformationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating (on which distributor is operating)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DistDeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> <xsd:element ref="TermLocID" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveCICodeDeviceDetlsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of request origination device from which the transaction is originating for message RetrieveCICode (on which the consumer is shopping)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:DeviceType"/> <xsd:element ref="IPAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="DeviceOS"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BrowserInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element comprises of the details of standard browser type elements</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UserAgent" type="cmn:Max256Text"/> <xsd:element name="ActiveHeaders" type="cmn:Max256Text"/> <xsd:element name="TimeZone" type="cmn:Max32Text"/> <xsd:element name="Screen" type="cmn:Max64Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CookieId" type="cmn:Max36Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the IP Address of the transaction originating source</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TermLocID" type="cmn:Max128Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the Terminal Location Id. Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFORMOB, SUBMITRTPFORBRN, SUBMITRTPFORGEN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceOS" type="DeviceOSEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the OS of the device from which the transaction is originating</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DeviceOSEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the OS of the device from which the transaction is originating</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="AND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WINMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHERS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="IPAddress" type="IPAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the IP Address of the transaction originating source</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="IPAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>IPAddress</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="45"/> <xsd:pattern value="(((25[0-5])|(2[0-4]\d)|(1?\d{1,2}))\.){3}((25[0-5])|(2[0-4]\d)|(1?\d{1,2}))"/> <xsd:pattern value="([0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)::(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){6,6})(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)){3}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <xsd:pattern value="(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})*)?)::(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:)*)(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]?\d?\d)){3}(%[^%\s]+)?"/> <!--Normal IPv6--> <!--IPv6 Hex Compressed--> <!--IPv6 Hex + IPv4 Dec--> <!--IPv6 Hex Compressed + IPv4 Dec--> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : rtpsummarydata_4.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh Babu--> <!--MIG Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--Change history : Added dontations to the txn type as a part of http://10.105.34.62:8080/browse/AP-4161--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="RTPSummaryDetails" type="RTPSummaryDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includesthe summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSummaryDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includes the summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProductType"/> <xsd:element ref="TxType"/> <xsd:element ref="TxCheckout"/> <xsd:element ref="TxIdentification"/> <xsd:element ref="TxRestriction" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="InvoiceDateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymtInfo"/> <xsd:element name="CanUseCredit" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProductType" type="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="SubmitRTPProductTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONLINE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ONLINEMPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SMB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TELEPHONE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxType" type="TxTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxCheckout" type="TxCheckoutEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction CheckOut</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxIdentification" type="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Transaction Identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TxRestriction" type="TxRestrictionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the restrictions for the transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TxRestrictionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Transaction Restriction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="16PLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="18PLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="25PLUS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="InvoiceDateTime" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="cmn:CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="PaymtInfo" type="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the PaymtInfo</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Currency"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies the type of settlement request (immediate or deferred).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PaymtAmtInfo" type="PaymtAmtInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillData" type="BillDataType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPInfo" type="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ACRType"/> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPExpDateTime" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date until which the agreement is valid.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total indicative Amount (Guideline Price) of subsequent payment Transaction or the Bill Amount which has to be agreed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount up-to which customer agreed to pay via subsequent payment /Billing Transaction(s).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="DetailedAmtType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Detailed amount description associated with the total amount of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPIdentifier" type="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP order payment identifier.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PaymtAmtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="DetailedAmt" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TxTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transactions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="BILLPT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INVOICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DONATIONS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PEDCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:CICode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="RetrieveInitMethod" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="TxDtTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CodeRequired" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SettlementTxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="TxDtTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CodeRequired" type="CodeRequiredTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element will indicate what must be sent in response to the submit request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="CodeRequiredTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="BRN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="TxDtTime" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> <xsd:simpleType name="TxCheckoutEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction Channel</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="GAIDCHK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NRMLCHK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QKPACHK"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="DetailedAmtType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DetailedAmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AmtType" type="AmtCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="AmtValue" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="Rate" type="cmn:decimalType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Applied Rate</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="AmtCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Detailed Amount Description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DELC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FEES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RBTS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VATX"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="BillDataType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BillActId" type="cmn:Max28Text" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillReference" type="cmn:Max28Text"/> <xsd:element name="BillPeriodFrom" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillPeriodTo" type="cmn:ISODate" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="BillAdhocInfo" type="cmn:Max55TextOptional" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreditAct" type="CreditActInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CreditActInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreditActNum" type="cmn:AccountNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="CreditSortCode" type="cmn:SortCodeType"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:RollNum" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RTPInfo" type="RTPInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RTPInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTransactionId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RTPDetail" type="RTPDetailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component includes the detailed RTP, i.e line items in invoice and break up of the total payment amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPDetailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP Detail</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Product" type="ProductType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtReqDetails" type="SetlmtReqDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This component comprises of all the information on the requested settlement amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtReqDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This component comprises of all the information on the requested settlement amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxIdentification" type="SettlementTxIdentificationType"/> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureRequestType" type="OrderClosureRequestTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="SetlmtInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtInfo" type="SetlmtInfoType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Currency" type="cmn:CurrencyCodeType"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProductType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Product</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProductCode"/> <xsd:element ref="ProductDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="UnitOfMeasure" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ProductQuantity" type="cmn:DecimalNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="UnitPrice" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="ProductAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="OtherAmt" type="DetailedAmtType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalProductInfo" type="cmn:Max35TextOptional" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProductCode" type="cmn:Max70Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Product Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProductDesc" type="cmn:Max70TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Product Description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UnitOfMeasure" type="UnitOfMeasureCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Unit of Measure</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UnitOfMeasureCode"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACRE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ARES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CELI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CMET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FOOT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GBGA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GBOU"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GBPI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GBQA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GRAM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HECT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INCH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KILO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KMET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LITR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="METR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MILE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MILI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MMET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PIEC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SCMT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SMET"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SMIL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQFO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQKI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQMI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SQYA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TONS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USGA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USOU"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USPI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USQA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YARD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderClosureRequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RTPSenderInfo" type="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The full information of the RTP Sender ,i.e the Distributor and teh End Merchant information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="DetailMerchantInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SetlmtSenderInfo" type="SetlmtSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The full information of the RTP Sender, i.e. the Distributor and the End Merchant information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SetlmtSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The full information of the RTP Sender, i.e. the Distributor and the End Merchant information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DetailMerchantInfo" type="DetailMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Merchant details along with the address of the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DetailMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantInfo" type="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Merchant details along with the address of the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:MerchantRtnStrng" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ACRType" type="cmn:ACRTypeEnum"/> <xsd:complexType name="AdtnlRTPInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidResponseInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:GiftAidMarketingInd" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SetlmtPymtDecTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AdtnlOrderInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="QkPayDelAddressInfo" type="cmn:NotifyQkPayDelAddressInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RetrieveInitMethod" type="cmn:RetrieveInitMethodEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the POS method that was used by the consumer to retrieve the transaction. E.g. QR Code, Bar Code, NFC etc Not applicable for SUBMITRTPFORMOB, SUBMITRTPFORBRN, SUBMITRTPFORGEN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AddtnlOrderInfo" type="AddtnlOrderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds additional information regarding the order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddtnlOrderInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OrderClosureRequestType" type="cmn:OrderClosureRequestTypeCode"/> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount up-to which customer agreed to pay via subsequent payment /Billing Transaction(s).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total indicative Amount (Guideline Price) of subsequent payment Transaction or the Bill Amount which has to be agreed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="GHSFailureReason" type="GHSFailureReasonEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="GHSFailureReasonEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSEFAILURE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="GHSRTPInfoType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="RTPInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="GHSFailureReason" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="cmn:NumberType"/> <xsd:element name="FunctionCode" type="FunctionCodeEnum"/> <xsd:simpleType name="FunctionCodeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="12"/> <xsd:enumeration value="22"/> <xsd:enumeration value="23"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Z1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="02"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="BillReference" type="cmn:Max28Text"/> <xsd:element name="TotalPaymentReqAmount" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xsd:element name="RTPIdentifier" type="cmn:RTPIdentifier"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RTP Idenitifier</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RawQRCode" type="QRCodeType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="QRCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:NormalizedMax512Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MediaParameters" type="MediaParametersType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MediaParametersType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MediaParameterValue" type="cmn:Max445Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distributordata.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="DistributorId" type="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This holds Distributor Id.In case of Bill Pay,this will hold the id applicable for ‘MyBillsOnline’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Distributor Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DistributorName" type="cmn:Max35TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantGroupId" type="cmn:Max60TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned as Merchant Group id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLogoURL" type="cmn:Max512Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Merchant Logo URL</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MerchantCmnNameOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:Max35TextOptional"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Address with Post Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="cmn:CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistributorInfo" type="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="DistributorName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantCmnName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantCtgyCd" type="cmn:Max4Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Merchant Ctgy Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KeyMerchantId" type="cmn:Max6Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingDetails" type="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantLinkingDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantTokenDetails"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantTokenDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant token details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Token" type="cmn:Max19Text"/> <xsd:element name="TokenExpiry" type="cmn:Exact4NumericText"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantTokenDetails" type="MerchantTokenDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : FIdata.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAccountInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="FIShortName"/> <xsd:element ref="FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FIId" type="FIIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The FIId of the FI with which the Consumer is registered for AP service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FIShortName" type="cmn:Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message field specifies the FI Short Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerId" type="cmn:Max28Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the unique customer Id provided by the FI to AP.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConsumerAcct" type="ConsumerAcctType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account related information including the fund /balance position</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AcctNum" type="cmn:AccountNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AcctSortCode" type="cmn:SortCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account sort code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RollNum" type="cmn:RollNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the Roll number information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerAcctType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="AcctNum"/> <xsd:element ref="AcctSortCode"/> <xsd:element ref="RollNum" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="FIIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FI Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerDetails" type="FIConsumerDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the FIConsumerDetails</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccountNickName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message field specifies the token</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIShortName"/> <xsd:element ref="AccountNickName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account related information including the fund /balance position</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmt" type="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistRiskAsmtDetails" type="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ConsumerRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConsumerRiskAssessment" type="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIConsumerId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantRiskAssessment" type="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="IssueCodes" type="cmn:Max1024Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Issue codes provide insight to why a consumer or merchant has an elevated risk score.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AssessmentType" type="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="standard"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="StatusCode" type="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Score" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive, with 0 being the lowest risk and 1 being the highest risk.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Confidence" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive with 0 being the lowest confidence and 1 being the highest confidence.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmtResp" type="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If any information is unavailable in the ‘consumerAssessments’ or ‘merchantAssessments’ in the response from Fraud, then only this field with value ‘NOTAVL’ will be sent without the ‘consumerAssessments’ and the ‘merchantAssessments’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTAVL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" type="cmn:QkPayDelAddressInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentStatusInfo" type="PaymentStatusTypeForEnquiryRTP"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:PaymentRef" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SettlementType" minOccurs="0"/> name="CookieExpiryDays" type="cmn:NumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : acknowledgementdata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" xmlns:msg="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" schemaLocation="messageheaderdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="Ack" type="AckType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AckType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MessageStatus" type="MessageStatusEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Acknowledgement</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="RECD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMATIONREPEATIDENTIFIED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="APFaultDetails" type="APFaultDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP system returns encapsulated fault details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="APFaultDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="faultid" type="cmn:Max45Text"/> <xsd:element name="errorcode" type="cmn:Max15Text"/> <xsd:element name="errormessage" type="cmn:Max255Text"/> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute namespace="##any" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
