con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managepaymentservice_4" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns="http://ap.com/wsdl/managepaymentservice_4" xmlns:mpd="http://ap.com/xsd/managepaymentdata_4" xmlns:flt="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4"> <wsdl:documentation>This WSDL is used to communicate between Bank and AP, When Bank retrieves RTP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managepaymentservice_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managepaymentdata_4" schemaLocation="managepaymentdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/soapfault_4.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="APFaultDetails"> <wsdl:part name="APFaultDetails" element="flt:APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrieveRTP_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="retrieveRTP_1Request" element="mpd:RetrieveRTP_1Request"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrieveRTP_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="retrieveRTP_1Response" element="mpd:RetrieveRTP_1Response"/> </wsdl:message> <!--WSDL message for ConfirmPaymentRequest--> <wsdl:message name="confirmPayment_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="confirmPayment_1Request" element="mpd:ConfirmPayment_1Request"/> </wsdl:message> <!--WSDL message for ConfirmPaymentResponse--> <wsdl:message name="confirmPayment_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="confirmPayment_1Response" element="mpd:ConfirmPayment_1Response"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManagePayment_4PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="retrieveRTP_1"> <wsdl:documentation>New documentation</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="retrieveRTP_1Request" message="retrieveRTP_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="retrieveRTP_1Response" message="retrieveRTP_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:operation> <!--WSDL operation for ConfirmPaymentRequest--> <wsdl:operation name="confirmPayment_1"> <wsdl:documentation>New documentation</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="confirmPayment_1Request" message="confirmPayment_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="confirmPayment_1Response" message="confirmPayment_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ManagePaymentSOAPBinding_4" type="ManagePayment_4PortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="retrieveRTP_1"> <soap:operation soapAction="retrieveRTP_1" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails"> <soap:fault name="APFaultDetails" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="confirmPayment_1"> <soap:operation soapAction="confirmPayment_1" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails"> <soap:fault name="APFaultDetails" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ManagePaymentService_4"> <wsdl:port name="ManagePaymentSOAPEndpoint_4" binding="ManagePaymentSOAPBinding_4"> <soap:address location="http://www.ap.com/services/ManagePayment_4"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--Author : Suresh babu Date : Revision : 1.0
Please update the further changes to the schema in change history Change History: Removed APTranscationID as part of http://10.105.34.62:8080/browse/AP-4297
Schema for CFI which includes confirmPayment and retrieveRTP--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managepaymentdata_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/managepaymentdata_4" xmlns:ori="http://ap.com/xsd/requestorigination_4" xmlns:msg="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:ack="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" xmlns:rtp="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" xmlns:pmd="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" xmlns:rsk="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" xmlns:ns1="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/messageheaderdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/requestorigination_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/requestoriginationdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/rtp_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/rtpdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/paymentdetails_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/paymentdetailsdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/acknowledgementdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/riskassessment_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" schemaLocation="../Common_4/soapfault_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RetrieveRTP_1Request" type="RetrieveRTP_1Request"/> <xsd:element name="RetrieveRTP_1Response" type="RetrieveRTP_1Response"/> <xsd:element name="ConfirmPayment_1Request" type="ConfirmPayment_1Request"/> <xsd:element name="ConfirmPayment_1Response" type="ConfirmPayment_1Response"/> <!--ConfirmPayment_1Request--> <xsd:complexType name="ConfirmPayment_1Request"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="ConfirmPaymentMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:RTPInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:RTPStatusInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:AddtnlRTPInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:SetlmtPaymtDetails" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:MerchantLinkingInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LinkedTransactionInfo" type="LinkedTransactionInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ConfirmPayment_1Response--> <xsd:complexType name="ConfirmPayment_1Response"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element name="StatusAck" type="StatusAck"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Message Header for confirm payment request--> <xsd:complexType name="ConfirmPaymentMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message Header for confirm payment request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="ConfirmPaymentMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--StatusAck--> <xsd:complexType name="StatusAck"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the StatusAckType Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MessageStatus" type="ack:MessageStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:TxnStatus" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:TxnStatusDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:SetlmtStatus" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="pmd:SetlmtStatusDesc" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalInfo" type="AdditionalInfoEnum" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Message Type elements for confirm payment request--> <xsd:simpleType name="ConfirmPaymentMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMDEFERREDRTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMDEFERREDSETTLEMENT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveRTP_1Request"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="RetrieveRTPMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element ref="ori:RequestOrigination" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="RequestInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RequestInfo" type="RequestInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element defines the necessary element for retrieve RTP request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RequestInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIConsumerId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:BRN" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ApTRId" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveRTPMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="RetrieveRTPMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="RetrieveRTPMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="RetrieveRTP_1Response"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element ref="RTPIdentifier"/> <xsd:element ref="RTPSenderInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="RTPSummary"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:RTPDetail" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:Delivery"/> <xsd:element ref="rsk:RiskAsmt"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:CreditAct" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:SuspensionInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PayConnectInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="FILinkDetails" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalLinkingInfo" type="AdditionalLinkingInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AdditionalLinkingInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Type" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:simpleType name="TypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MIT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AOF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BOTH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType>--> <xsd:element name="RTPSenderInfo" type="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The full information of the RTP Sender ,i.e the Distributor and teh End Merchant information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSenderInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="DetailMerchantInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="DetailMerchantInfo" type="DetailMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Merchant details along with the address of the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DetailMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantInfo"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantAddress"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantInfo" type="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Merchant details along with the address of the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCtgyCd"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:MerchantRtnStrng" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCmnName"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantLogoURL" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RTPIdentifier" type="cmn:RTPIdentifier"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RTPSummary" type="RTPSummaryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includes the summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="RTPSummaryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This components includes the summary information of transaction(RTP)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="rtp:ProductType"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxType"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxCheckout"/> <xsd:element ref="TxIdentification"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:TxRestriction" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:InvoiceDateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PaymtInfo"/> <xsd:element name="CanUseCredit" type="cmn:YNType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PaymtInfo" type="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component contains information regarding the payment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PaymtInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component contains information regarding the payment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="rtp:Currency"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency associated with the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies the type of settlement request (immediate or deferred).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPInfo" type="DefrdRTPInfoType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PaymtAmtInfo" type="rtp:PaymtAmtInfoType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component indicates the transaction value amount.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BillData" type="rtp:BillDataType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DefrdRTPInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreement Information message component.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ACRType" type="cmn:ACRTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="DefrdRTPExpDateTime" type="cmn:ISODate"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date until which the agreement is valid.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="rtp:DefrdRTPAgrmtAmount"/> <xsd:element ref="rtp:DefrdRTPMaxAgrdAmount" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DetailedAmt" type="rtp:DetailedAmtType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Detailed amount description associated with the total amount of the transaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="TxIdentification" type="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Transaction Identifiers</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="TxIdentificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To Identify the Transaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TxDtTime" type="cmn:ISODateTime"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RTPId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:OrderRef" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="PayConnectInfo" type="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of payconnect cookie Indicates if a PayConnect cookie dialog should prompted during RTP Authorisation in the FI Mobile App</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="PayConnectInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ShowPCCDialog" type="cmn:YNType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="InitiatorIsAuthoriser" type="cmn:YNType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="AdditionalInfoEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Additional Info to CFI</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="PaidByCreditInvalid"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FILinkDetails" type="FILinkDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains details of Merchant Link button and consumer account details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FILinkDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is merchant link flag which indicates merchant flag is enable or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkingFlag" type="cmn:YType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AccountLinkedDetails" type="AccountLinkedDetailsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AccountLinkedDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contain consumer account details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerIBAN" type="cmn:Max35Text"/> <xsd:element name="AuthorisationRequiredFlag" type="cmn:YNType"/> <xsd:element name="MaxAutoAuthLimit" type="cmn:ImpliedCurrencyAndAmount" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinkedTransactionInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AuthorisedByConsumerFlag" type="cmn:YNType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh Babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:ISODateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKADDCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKDELCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ADDMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSHNOTIFY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INBROWSERPAYMTINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYDEFERREDSETTLEMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYDEFERREDRTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMENTSTATUSRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTPAYMENTSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTRTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOTRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOSTLMT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVETRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPGETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOCONSADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOCICODES"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPTOPAYMENTCONFIRMATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORBRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORGEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFOREPOS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOGETREFACCFRMCFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTTOSETTLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EPOSRTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEFERREDSETTLEMENTSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEFERREDRTPSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACRRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETOACR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SETTLEMENTSTATUSRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITMEDIAPAYMENTREQUEST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITMEDIAPAYMENTRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITLINKEDRTPRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYLINKEDRTPINIT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75TextOptional"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : commondata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Suresh babu--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="QkPayDeliveryAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="PostCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddresseeNameType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Title" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="FirstName" type="Max107Text"/> <xsd:element name="MiddleName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" type="Max35Text" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="OrderRef" type="Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Reference</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SettlementType" type="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates settlement type of the successful payment transaction e.g. FPS/ONUS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="SettlementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of successful payment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ONUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-SIP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FPS-FDP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Title" type="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="TitleTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MRS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MISS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SIR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAME"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROF"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="BRN" type="BRNType"> <xsd:element name="RTPId" type="RTPIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique transaction reference code generated by the Message sender-Distributor to uniquely identify their transaction,
