<!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : acknowledgementdata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement_4" xmlns:msg="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader_4" schemaLocation="messageheaderdata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="Ack" type="AckType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AckType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MessageStatus" type="MessageStatusEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Acknowledgement</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="RECD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMATIONREPEATIDENTIFIED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/riskassessment_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" xmlns:fin="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/financialinstitution_4" schemaLocation="financialinstitutiondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor_4" schemaLocation="distributordata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmt" type="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistRiskAsmtDetails" type="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant and Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistRiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RiskAsmtType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="RiskAsmtResp" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="ConsumerRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantRiskAssessment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConsumerRiskAssessment" type="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Consumer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIConsumerId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantRiskAssessment" type="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Risk Assessments(score) of Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantRiskAssessmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="Score"/> <xsd:element ref="Confidence" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="IssueCodes" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="StatusCode"/> <xsd:element ref="AssessmentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="IssueCodes" type="cmn:Max1024Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Issue codes provide insight to why a consumer or merchant has an elevated risk score.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AssessmentType" type="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="AssessmentTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="standard"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="StatusCode" type="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code indicating if the response was calculated successfully or failed for some reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="StatusCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="success"/> <xsd:enumeration value="failure"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Score" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive, with 0 being the lowest risk and 1 being the highest risk.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Confidence" type="cmn:Max5Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The valid range will be from 0 to 1 inclusive with 0 being the lowest confidence and 1 being the highest confidence.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RiskAsmtResp" type="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If any information is unavailable in the ‘consumerAssessments’ or ‘merchantAssessments’ in the response from Fraud, then only this field with value ‘NOTAVL’ will be sent without the ‘consumerAssessments’ and the ‘merchantAssessments’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RiskAsmtRespType"> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTAVL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault_4" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common_4" schemaLocation="commondata_4.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="APFaultDetails" type="APFaultDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP system returns encapsulated fault details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="APFaultDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="faultid" type="cmn:Max45Text"/> <xsd:element name="errorcode" type="cmn:Max15Text"/> <xsd:element name="errormessage" type="cmn:Max255Text"/> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:anyAttribute namespace="##any" processContents="lax"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : managemerchantservice_1.wsdl--> <!--Author : Teja Yarlagadda--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : 22-05-2013--> <!--======================================================================--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managemerchantservice_1" xmlns="http://ap.com/wsdl/managemerchantservice_1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:mmd="http://ap.com/xsd/managemerchantdata_1" xmlns:flt="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault"> <wsdl:documentation>This WSDL is used by merchant's Bank to send the merchant registration/updation details to AP and gets the acknowledgement ack.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/wsdl/managemerchantservice_1"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="managemerchantdata_1.xsd" namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managemerchantdata_1"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/soapfault" schemaLocation="../Common_1/soapfault_1.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="APFaultDetails"> <wsdl:part name="APFaultDetails" element="flt:APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="maintainMerchant_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="maintainMerchant_1Request" element="mmd:MaintainMerchant_1Request"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="maintainMerchant_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="maintainMerchant_1Response" element="mmd:MaintainMerchant_1Response"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManageMerchant_1PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="maintainMerchant_1"> <wsdl:documentation>Maintain of merchant with AP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="maintainMerchant_1Request" message="maintainMerchant_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="maintainMerchant_1Response" message="maintainMerchant_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ManageMerchant_1SOAPBinding" type="ManageMerchant_1PortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="maintainMerchant_1"> <soap:operation soapAction="maintainMerchant_1" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails"> <soap:fault name="APFaultDetails" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ManageMerchantService_1"> <wsdl:port name="ManageMerchant_1SOAPEndpoint" binding="ManageMerchant_1SOAPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.ap.com/services/ManageMerchant_1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : managemerchantdata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Teja Yarlagadda--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : 22-05-2013--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/managemerchantdata_1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/managemerchantdata_1" xmlns:msg="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common" xmlns:dst="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor" xmlns:ack="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader" schemaLocation="../Common_1/messageheaderdata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="../Common_1/commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor" schemaLocation="../Common_1/distributordata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement" schemaLocation="../Common_1/acknowledgementdata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MaintainMerchant_1Request" type="RequestMerchantMaintainType"/> <xsd:element name="MaintainMerchant_1Response" type="ResponseMerchantMaintainType"/> <xsd:complexType name="RequestMerchantMaintainType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MaintainMerchantMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="Merchant"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MaintainMerchantMsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MaintainMerchantMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="MaintainMerchantMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINMERCHANT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Merchant" type="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component includes the ACK details pertaining to the merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantRegistrationInfo" type="MerchantRegistrationInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RequestType"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:UpdateReason" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantRegistrationInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This includes all the attributes of the Merchant required for Zapp registration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantGroupId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCmnName"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantLogoURL" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCtgyCd"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:KeyMerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantAddress"/> <xsd:element ref="CreditAct"/> <xsd:element ref="ImmediacyMerchantInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreditAct" type="CreditActType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account related information including the fund /balance position</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="CreditActType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CreditActNum"/> <xsd:element ref="CreditSortCode"/> <xsd:element ref="RollNumber" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreditActNum" type="cmn:AccountNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreditSortCode" type="cmn:SortCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account sort code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RollNumber" type="cmn:RollNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message component holds the account roll number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <!--Start Immediacy Info Changes--> <xsd:element name="ImmediacyMerchantInfo" type="ImmediacyMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Immediacy Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ImmediacyMerchantInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="McMerchantId" type="cmn:Max15Text"/> <xsd:element name="McAcquirerId" type="cmn:Exact6NumericText"/> <xsd:element name="SettlementIBAN" type="cmn:Max34Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--End Immediacy Info Changes--> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseMerchantMaintainType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ack:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantResponseStatusInfo"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantResponseStatusInfo" type="MerchantResponseStatusInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Maintain Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantResponseStatusInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Merchant Maintain Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:UpdateStatus"/> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatus"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatus"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:APDateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKMAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKADDCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACKDELCONSUMERADDRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ADDMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSHNOTIFY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETCERTFROMMDESREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETCERTFROMMDESRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INBROWSERPAYMTINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINCONSUMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MAINTAINMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTIFYPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSCERTIFICATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSREQUESTCERT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMENTSTATUSRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTPAYMENTSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTRTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOTRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVETRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPGETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOCONSADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPTOPAYMENTCONFIRMATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITPAYOUTRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORBRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORGEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOGETREFACCFRMCFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REFDATREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REFDATRESP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : commondata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RequestType" type="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^/\.@ ][^@/ ]*[@][^/@\. ]+[\.][^@/ ]*[^@/\. ]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="34"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency Code as per ISO 4217 standard</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SuspensionInfo" type="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Details of Suspension</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspension" type="ConsumerSuspensionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspension" type="MerchantSuspensionType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerSuspensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspensionInitiator" type="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerSuspensionCode" type="SuspensionCodeEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantSuspensionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspensionInitiator" type="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantSuspensionCode" type="SuspensionCodeEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="SuspensionInitiatorEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ZAPP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DIST"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SuspensionCodeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="FRAUDC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FRAUDS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USEREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VULPER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IDTHEF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VIOLAG"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VIOLZA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EXCRGB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INSOLV"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COLLUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ILLEGA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LAUNDE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code of the Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="PostCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="CountryCode"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="APDate"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"> <xsd:pattern value="((000[1-9])|(00[1-9][0-9])|(0[1-9][0-9]{2})|([1-9][0-9]{3}))-((0[1-9])|(1[012]))-((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="APDateTime"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:pattern value="((000[1-9])|(00[1-9][0-9])|(0[1-9][0-9]{2})|([1-9][0-9]{3}))-((0[1-9])|(1[012]))-((0[1-9])|([12][0-9])|(3[01]))T(([01][0-9])|(2[0-3]))(:[0-5][0-9]){2}(\.[0-9]{1,3})?Z"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="Max35Text"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/distributor" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.com/xsd/common"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distributordata.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="DistributorId" type="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This holds Distributor Id.In case of Bill Pay,this will hold the id applicable for ‘MyBillsOnline’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Distributor Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DistributorName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantGroupId" type="cmn:Max60Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned as Merchant Group id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLogoURL" type="cmn:Max512Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Merchant Logo URL</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MerchantCmnNameOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:Max35Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Address with Post Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="cmn:CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistributorInfo" type="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="DistributorName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantCmnName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantCtgyCd" type="cmn:Max4Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Merchant Ctgy Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KeyMerchantId" type="cmn:Max6Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : acknowledgementdata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/acknowledgement" xmlns:msg="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.com/xsd/messageheader" schemaLocation="messageheaderdata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="Ack" type="AckType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AckType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MessageStatus" type="MessageStatusEnum"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Acknowledgement</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="RECD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Registration Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:OrgReqMsgId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distmanagelinkedaccountdata.xsd--> <!--Author : Siripireddy Subbareddy--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distmanagelinkedaccountdata_1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distmanagelinkedaccountdata_1" xmlns:msg="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" xmlns:ack="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/acknowledgement" xmlns:dst="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" schemaLocation="../MDMCommon_1/messageheaderdata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="../MDMCommon_1/commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor" schemaLocation="../MDMCommon_1/distributordata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/acknowledgement" schemaLocation="../MDMCommon_1/acknowledgementdata_1.xsd"/> <!--AP332 Submit Delete Link Request--> <xsd:element name="DeleteLinkedAccount_1Request" type="DeleteLinkedAccount_1RequestType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteLinkedAccount_1RequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="DeleteLinkedAccountMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantDetails" type="MerchantDetailsType"/> <xsd:element name="Action" type="ActionEnumTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="LinksToDelete" type="LinksToDeleteType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteLinkedAccountMsgHdrType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgId"/> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="DeleteLinkedMerchantMsgEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="msg:Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinksToDeleteType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkId" type="cmn:Max36Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionEnumTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of ActionEnum</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETESPECIFIC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DeleteLinkedMerchantMsgEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LinkedStatusTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of LinkedStatus</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="VALID"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INVALID"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--AP333 Submit delete link Response--> <xsd:element name="DeleteLinkedAccount_1Response" type="DeleteLinkedAccount_1ResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteLinkedAccount_1ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantDetails" type="MerchantDetailsType"/> <xsd:element name="LinksDeleted" type="LinksDeletedType"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:FaultInfo" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinksDeletedType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"/> <xsd:element name="LinkStatus" type="LinkStatusTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkId" type="cmn:Max36Text"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="LinkStatusTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of LinkStatus</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Linked merchants common types--> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantAccountInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="dst:DistributorId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:APDateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="POSCERTIFICATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSREQUESTCERT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TOKENISEACCOUNTRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNTRESP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="PkixCertType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base 64 encoded string containing a PKIX the Event Type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="chargebackCreated"/> <xsd:enumeration value="chargebackUpdated"/> <xsd:enumeration value="cfiConsumerRegistration"/> <xsd:enumeration value="cfiConsumerRegistrationFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="cfiConsumerUpdate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="cfiConsumerViewNotification"/> <xsd:enumeration value="cfiRegistration"/> <xsd:enumeration value="distributorRegistration"/> <xsd:enumeration value="lateConfirmedRtp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="lateRtpFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="merchantRegistration"/> <xsd:enumeration value="merchantRegistrationFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="merchantUpdate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="neverRetrievedRtp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="neverConfirmedRtp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="refundFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="refundNotification"/> <xsd:enumeration value="retrieveRtp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="retrieveRtpFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="rtpConfirmation"/> <xsd:enumeration value="rtpConfirmationFailure"/> <xsd:enumeration value="submitRtp"/> <xsd:enumeration value="submitRtpFailure"/> </xsd:restriction> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distributordata.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="DistributorId" type="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This holds Distributor Id.In case of Bill Pay,this will hold the id applicable for ‘MyBillsOnline’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Distributor Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DistributorName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantGroupId" type="cmn:Max60Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned as Merchant Group id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLogoURL" type="cmn:Max512Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Merchant Logo URL</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MerchantCmnNameOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:Max35Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Address with Post Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="cmn:CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistributorInfo" type="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="DistributorName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantCmnName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantCtgyCd" type="cmn:Max4Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Merchant Ctgy Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KeyMerchantId" type="cmn:Max6Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

name="LinkedMerchantsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCmnName"/> <xsd:element name="AccountNickName" type="cmn:Max35Text"/> <xsd:element name="IBAN" type="cmn:Max34Text"/> <xsd:element name="LinkedStatus" type="LinkedStatusEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantLinkId"/> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"/> <xsd:element name="AdditionalLinkingInfo" type="AdditionalLinkingInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="fin:FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GetLinkedMerchants_1RequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="GetLinkedMerchantsMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1RequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="DeleteLinkedMerchantsMsgHdrType"/> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="ActionEnum" type="ActionEnumTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="LinksToDelete" type="LinksToDeleteType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinksToDeleteType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantLinkId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionEnumTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of ActionEnum</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETESPECIFIC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LinkedStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Linked Status values</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="VALID"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INVALID"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="GetLinkedMerchants_1ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="LinkedMerchants" type="LinkedMerchantsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1ResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="msg:MsgHdr"/> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerInfo" type="FIConsumerInfoType"/> <xsd:element name="LinksDeleted" type="LinksDeletedType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LinksDeletedType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="dst:MerchantCmnName"/> <xsd:element name="LinkStatus" type="LinkStatusTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantLinkId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantLinkId" type="cmn:Max36Text"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LinkStatusTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of LinkStatus</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="GetLinkedMerchants_1Request" type="GetLinkedMerchants_1RequestType"/> <xsd:element name="GetLinkedMerchants_1Response" type="GetLinkedMerchants_1ResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1Request" type="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1RequestType"/> <xsd:element name="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1Response" type="DeleteLinkedMerchants_1ResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:APDateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="POSCERTIFICATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSREQUESTCERT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TOKENISEACCOUNTRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNTRESP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : commondata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of retrieve message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of confirm message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RequestType" type="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^/\.@ ][^@/ ]*[@][^/@\. ]+[\.][^@/ ]*[^@/\. ]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="34"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency Code as per ISO 4217 standard</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SuspensionInfo" type="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Details of <xsd:simpleType name="APDateTime"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:pattern name="LinkingResponseInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="LinkingRefCode" type="cmn:LRCType"/> <xsd:element name="ApLRId" type="cmn:APTRIdType"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> <xsd:element ref="cmn:ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/messageheader" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : messageheader.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="MsgHdr" type="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="MsgHdrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will define the Message Header Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MsgId"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgType"/> <xsd:element ref="MsgTimestamp"/> <xsd:element ref="OrgReqMsgId" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="Adhoc" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID to identify a Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgType" type="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To identify the type of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MsgTimestamp" type="cmn:APDateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>TimeStamp of the Message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MsgTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Messages</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="POSCERTIFICATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSREQUESTCERT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMVERTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMRTLRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TOKENISEACCOUNTRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDACCOUNTRESP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="OrgReqMsgId" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Original Request Message ID incase of Response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : commondata_1.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.0--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="RtrvlExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of retrieve message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConfmtnExpiryTimeIntrvl" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RtrvlExpiryTime - Time interval in seconds for expiry of confirm message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine4" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine5" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine6" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="stringType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="decimalType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update Status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="RequestType" type="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This specifies if the record for the consumer is to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REACTIVATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="ActivationStatus" type="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEACTIVATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PostCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Post Code for the delivery</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="Max15Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email Address</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:maxLength value="256"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^/\.@ ][^@/ ]*[@][^/@\. ]+[\.][^@/ ]*[^@/\. ]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="34"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SortCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="stringType"> <xsd:length value="6"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency Code as per ISO 4217 standard</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="SuspensionInfo" type="SuspensionInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>To define the Details of <xsd:simpleType name="APDateTime"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:pattern <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="FIId" type="FIIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The FIId of the FI with which the Consumer <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FIShortName" type="cmn:Max15Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This message field specifies the FI Short Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FIConsumerId" type="cmn:Max28Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the unique customer Id provided by the FI to AP.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FIConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FIId"/> <xsd:element ref="FIConsumerId"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="CFIRegistered"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerName" type="cmn:AddresseeNameType"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerMobNb" type="ConsumerMobNbType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ConsumerEmail" type="cmn:EmailAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CFIRegistered" type="cmn:YNType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ConsumerMobNbType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="cmn:MobNb"/> <xsd:element ref="MobNbVerified"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MobNbVerified" type="cmn:YNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Mobile Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/distributor" xmlns:cmn="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common"> <xsd:import namespace="http://ap.mdm.com/xsd/common" schemaLocation="commondata_1.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--Filename : distributordata.xsd--> <!--Author : Rohit Dixit--> <!--Version : 1.2--> <!--Last Update : Date--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:element name="DistributorId" type="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This holds Distributor Id.In case of Bill Pay,this will hold the id applicable for ‘MyBillsOnline’</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="DistributorIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Distributor Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="DistributorName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantId" type="cmn:Max25Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantGroupId" type="cmn:Max60Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned as Merchant Group id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantCmnName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantLogoURL" type="cmn:Max512Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will hold the Merchant Logo URL</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="MerchantCmnNameOptionalType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AP Transaction ID, Unique for every transaction in AP</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="cmn:Max35Text"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="MerchantName" type="cmn:Max35Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Common Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MerchantAddress" type="cmn:AddressMandatoryCountryCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Address with Post Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryCode" type="cmn:CountryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Merchant Country Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Adhoc" type="cmn:Max75Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Adhoc Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DistributorInfo" type="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="DistributorInfoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Distributor Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="DistributorId"/> <xsd:element ref="DistributorName" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MerchantDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="MerchantId"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantName"/> <xsd:element ref="MerchantCmnName"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MerchantCtgyCd" type="cmn:Max4Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Merchant Ctgy Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="KeyMerchantId" type="cmn:Max6Text"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique ID assigned to a Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

name="deleteDeliveryAddress_1Request"> <wsdl:part name="deleteDeliveryAddress_1Request" element="mcd:DeleteDeliveryAddress_1Request"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteDeliveryAddress_1Response"> <wsdl:part name="deleteDeliveryAddress_1Response" element="mcd:DeleteDeliveryAddress_1Response"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ManageConsumer_1PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="maintainConsumer_1"> <wsdl:documentation>Registration of consumer with AP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="maintainConsumer_1Request" message="maintainConsumer_1Request"/> <wsdl:output name="maintainConsumer_1Response" message="maintainConsumer_1Response"/> <wsdl:fault name="APFaultDetails" message="APFaultDetails"/> value="ADDMERCHANT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PUSHNOTIFY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONFIRMPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETCERTFROMMDESREQ"/> value="NOTIFYPAYMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSCERTIFICATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POSREQUESTCERT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMENTSTATUSRESPONSE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTPAYMENTSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUESTRTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSETORTPSTATUS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPREFUNDACCNO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOTRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVERTP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETRIEVETRANSHIST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPGETACCFORREFUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOCONSADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RSPTOPAYMENTCONFIRMATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RTPFORAUTH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITPAYOUTRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTLREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORBRN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORMOB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBMITRTPFORGEN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPTOGETREFACCFRMCFI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GETLINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETELINKEDMERCHRESP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REFDATREQ"/> <xsd:enumeration <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ap.com/xsd/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ap.com/xsd/common"> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This Element will define the Full Address Information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine2" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="AddressLine3" minOccurs="0"/> name="DecimalNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xsd:totalDigits value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="UpdateStatus" type="UpdateStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The update status of the registration request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="UpdateStatusEnum"> to be added or updated or deleted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Update</xsd:documentation> Merchant</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:simpleType name="ActivationStatusEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This indicates the registration status of the con:testStep.name: Manual
con:testStep.con:description:
Till this point we have Created th Agreement(Token) and Now We will Run Payment Using above Agreement (Token) Till this point we have Created th Agreement(Token) and Now We will Run Payment Using above Agreement (Token)
Agreement is Created for AGreement Type - ALL
Then Provide Link Type in Below Step "SUBMITLIKEDRTP" Based on the Condition
If Agreement CReated for ALL , then provide the Link Type in Submit Linked RTP - AOF, MRT, MIT only If Agreement CReated for MRT , then provide the Link Type in Submit Linked RTP - MRT only If Agreement CReated for AOF , then provide the Link Type in Submit Linked RTP - AOF only If Agreement CReated for MIT , then provide the Link Type in Submit Linked RTP - MIT only
